page.title: 08Entertainment in Shawlands
page.content: To walk through Shawlands is like walking through a glutton's paradise.The choice of food is very cosmopolitan with Greek, Italian, Indian and Chinese cuisine to tempt the diner. These premises provide sit down and carryout facilities. At night the area around Shawlands is busy with people bringing custom to the many public bars and lounges. The abundance of these premises has its roots in the past when surrounding areas eg, Battlefield,Cathcart and Mount Florida were 'dry areas' ie no alcohol was sold. However this has changed in recent years and now public bars are springing up in these areas. Apart from food and drink, places of entertainment are limited. The main amusements are snooker clubs, bingo halls and for those who enjoy outdoor pursuits, cricket,tennis and bowling.
